title: Stunning Renovated 1BR/1.5BA Garden Apartment Available for Rent
posting_body: ['Newly rehabbed 1 bedroom, 1.5 bathroom garden apartment available in Hyde Park/Kenwood - Boulevard Address', 'Vintage, well manicured building with on-site management, security cameras, laundry facility, and bike room', 'Includes: Stainless steel appliances (including microwave), granite countertops, can lights, laminate and ceramic floors, and designed closet space.', 'Off-street parking lot located to the north of the building with assigned parking for extra monthly fee, while spots are available.', 'Heat and water included in rent', '5 minutes from U of C; 10 minutes from the Loop', 'Excellent public transportation, short distance to Lake Shore Drive', '- Less than 2 miles from University of Chicago (to the south); less than 2 miles from IIT (to the northwest); less than 4.5 miles from University of Illinois - Chicago (to the northwest); less than 4.5 miles from Columbia College (to the north)', 'Both U of C and Chicago Police service area', 'Rent: $1,395', 'Call Redel Rentals at 866-451-6837 for viewing appointment', 'For more information, visit - <URL>']
